title: Top 5 of CFP unchanged; Ducks leapfrog Ole Miss
content: Ohio State, Indiana, Texas A&M, Georgia and Texas Tech remained the top five teams in the latest College Football Playoff rankings released Tuesday, while Oregon jumped ahead of Ole Miss after its win over USC.

title: Luka, LeBron, Reaves combine for 99 to sink Clips
content: Luka Doncic had 43 points and fell one rebound shy of a triple-double, Austin Reaves had 31 points and LeBron James had 25 to lead the Lakers past the Clippers for their fifth straight win.

title: Okla. State hires UNT's Morris to revive program
content: Eric Morris, who has led North Texas to a 10-1 record this season while averaging 503.3 yards per game, has been hired as the next coach at Oklahoma State.

title: Vols, amid 'chatter' over schedule, topple Houston
content: Having heard the "chatter that we hadn't played anybody," Rick Barnes' No. 17 Volunteers took down No. 3 Houston at the Players Era tournament on Tuesday and avenged their loss to the Cougars in last season's Elite Eight.

title: Suggs tossed, 4 others T'd up in Magic-Sixers tiff
content: A heated altercation toward the end of the first half in Tuesday night's Magic-Sixers game resulted in Jalen Suggs being ejected and four other players receiving technical fouls.

title: Missing HS coach wanted on criminal charges
content: Travis L. Turner, who disappeared days before his undefeated team's playoff game, faces charges of possessing child sexual abuse material and using a computer to solicit a minor, Virginia State Police said.

title: ðŸ˜³ Is LeBron's most remarkable streak at risk?
content: James has scored in double-digits for nearly 1,300 straight games. But there is another streak that's even more remarkable -- and now in danger.

title: NBA Cup takeaways: Lakers clinch behind Doncic, Reaves and James
content: The NBA Cup continues as group play wraps up. Here's everything you need to know about the tournament.

title: Bill Belichick's legacy takes a detour at North Carolina
content: A season in, the legendary NFL coach's head-scratching decision to helm a lowly ACC team continues to confound.

title: Men: Purdue stays No. 1 overall, but the top four get a shake-up
content: The headlines might not be screaming about them, but we're noticing the Blue Devils' 1-seed-worthy rÃ©sumÃ©.

title: Women: Michigan up, Duke down and UConn still No. 1 overall
content: The Blue Devils have fallen short of preseason expectations, while rising Michigan has blown past them.

title: Updated NFL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus Thanksgiving game memories
content: We updated our rankings ahead of Week 13 -- and picked out Thanksgiving memories for 31 teams that have played on the holiday (sorry, Jaguars).

title: Can the Predators turn their season around?
content: Nashville is the NHL's worst team in the standings. Is there any hope of contention -- or is it time to make trades?

title: The untold story of John Cena's rap album, 'You Can't See Me'
content: "The Doctor of Thuganomics" wasn't just a gimmick. Andreas Hale spoke to the musicians who worked with Cena on his album from 20 years ago.

title: WWE 'Raw' takeaways: Doubt looms around Survivor Series: WarGames favorites
content: The "villain" team, led by The Vision, won the advantage match at "Raw." Are they favorites to take WarGames?

title: Teen star Estevao has Chelsea looking like a team that deserves 'world champions' tag
content: After a win like this in the Champions League over Barcelona, led by teen star Estevao, maybe Chelsea are the real deal after all.

title: Man City's squad issues were made apparent in loss to Leverkusen
content: Despite a rotated lineup, Manchester City's reserves did not showcase their talents and were left exposed.

title: How good are this year's top Japanese free agents -- and who could sign them?
content: We break down what to expect from Tatsuya Imai, Munetaka Murakami and Kazuma Okamoto in 2026 and where they might land.

title: They hired who?! Making sense of MLB's newest class of managers
content: A 33-year-old, a college coach, a recently retired reliever ... it's been quite an offseason for unconventional skippers. What does it mean?

title: Lane Kiffin has a near $100 million decision coming Saturday. He better win Friday
content: As drama at Ole Miss drags on, there's a game to play Friday. The pressure on Kiffin to win will be overwhelming.

title: Inside Lions DE Aidan Hutchinson's contract extension, and Micah Parsons' role
content: The Lions wanted to sign Hutchinson to a long-term contract, but deals for other pass rushers, especially Micah Parsons, kept moving the target.

title: One year of Amorim: How Man United have changed for the better -- or not
content: It has been one year since Ruben Amorim's first game in charge of Man United. There has been some improvement, but the core metrics of Amorim's influence tell a different story.

title: Why Bayern boss Kompany is well placed to succeed Guardiola at Man City
content: If Bayern's clash with Arsenal is an audition to replace Pep Guardiola, ex-City defender and ESPN FC analyst Nedum Onuoha thinks Kompany fits the bill.

title: What to know about Damon Jones, the man at the center of two NBA scandals
content: After making more than $21 million across 11 seasons in the NBA, the NBA journeyman fell hard -- and, prosecutors allege, into a life of crime.

title: Haney takes over at welterweight, Mason makes debut at 135
content: Devin Haney and Abdullah Mason shined in decision victories. Here are the latest ESPN rankings in all weight classes.

title: Omarion Hampton's practice window is open -- just in time for the fantasy trade deadline
content: Kris Rhim provides an update on RB Omarion Hampton, and how the Chargers' backfield could look when he returns.

title: MLS Cup conference semis talking points: All roads lead to Miami, Messi
content: Inter Miami's first MLS Cup is within reach after a convincing win over FC Cincinnati. Here's what else stood out from the conference semis.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool 'dream' of signing Bayern Munich's Olise
content: Bayern Munich star Michael Olise would be a "dream" signing for Liverpool. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Heisman Trophy race: Will Jeremiyah Love run past Fernando Mendoza, Julian Sayin?
content: The top candidates have emerged in the Heisman race, but what will it take for Jeremiyah Love to vault past Fernando Mendoza and Julian Sayin?

title: Pickups: Time to add Collin Gillespie, Derik Queen, Jusuf Nurkic
content: Every week in fantasy basketball, there are available players who can help fill holes in your roster. Here are the ones to add for the week ahead.

title: December schedule hacks: Stack your fantasy hockey lineups with Devils, Mammoth players
content: Your essential guide to lineup strategy for December, including how to use the NHL schedule to your advantage.

title: Weekly waiver pickups: Add these defensemen for assists, power-play points
content: The essential Monday guide to fantasy hockey pickups, with who to add and how to get set for the week ahead.

title: Cabinet clears Rs 7,200 cr rare earths scheme - why itâ€™s important
content: India is set to significantly bolster its rare earth magnet production with the Union Cabinet approving a Rs 7,280 crore scheme. This pioneering initiative aims to establish integrated manufacturing facilities, boosting domestic capacity to 6,000 metric tons annually. The seven-year plan focuses on the entire value chain, from oxides to finished magnets, enhancing India's strategic self-reliance.

title: Where is Imran Khan? Ex Pak PM's death rumors take over social media; sisters assaulted outside jail
content: Speculation surrounds Imran Khan's fate after his sisters were allegedly assaulted by police while seeking a meeting. Social media claims he was killed in Adiala Jail, where he has been held since August 2023. His sisters reported a "brutal and orchestrated assault" by Punjab police during a peaceful protest outside the jail.

title: Mosques take mic: In UP, imams lead the charge to help Muslims navigate SIR confusion
content: Across Muslim-majority neighbourhoods, this new civic refrain has become familiar. Officials say it is a routine update ahead of the 2027 assembly elections. But in neighbourhoods bruised by anxieties around CAA and NRC, the exercise is filled with anxiety.

title: Deepti Chaurasia, daughter-in-law of prominent pan masala group owner, dies by suicide in Delhi
content: A 40-year-old woman, identified as Deepti Chaurasia, daughter-in-law of a pan masala group owner, allegedly died by suicide in Vasant Vihar, south Delhi. Police have recovered a suicide note and are conducting an inquest into the matter. Family members have been interviewed, and an autopsy has been performed.

title: â€˜In spur of the momentâ€™: Ex-CJI Gavai reacts to no action after shoe hurling bid
content: Former Chief Justice of India, B.R. Gavai, revealed he acted on instinct during a shoe-hurling attempt in the Supreme Court, choosing to continue hearings immediately.  Despite the incident, he advised the Bar not to be distracted.  The accused lawyer's outburst was reportedly linked to alleged remarks by Gavai, which the former CJI has denied.

title: Nvidia publicly responds to 'losing' $250 billion to 'Google deal,' declares: We areâ€¦
content: Nvidia, the AI chip giant, publicly defended its market dominance after reports surfaced of Meta Platforms considering billions in spending on Google's competing AI chips. This news sent Nvidia's stock down significantly, while Alphabet shares rose. Google's Tensor Processing Units (TPUs) are emerging as a serious challenger, with Meta potentially renting them from Google Cloud.

title: 'Up to BCCI to decide my future': Gambhir faces heat after 2-0 whitewash; highlights past successes
content: Head coach Gautam Gambhir accepted blame for India's Test series defeat, acknowledging the team's collapse against South Africa. While admitting collective failure, he highlighted past successes and stated his future rests with the BCCI. Gambhir defended his selection strategy, emphasising tough characters over flair for Test cricket.

title: Donâ€™t blame us: OpenAI says teen's suicide wasnâ€™t ChatGPTâ€™s fault; claims chatbot misused
content: OpenAI denies responsibility for a teen's suicide, claiming he misused ChatGPT. The company's defense argues the 16-year-old's actions, not the AI, caused his death. However, chat logs reportedly show the chatbot discouraging mental health help and offering suicide advice, sparking widespread concern over AI's mental health risks.

title: â€˜Serious security breachâ€™: EC writes to Kolkata Police; seeks 48-hour action report
content: The Election Commission of India has expressed serious concern over the safety of poll officials in West Bengal following a security breach at the Chief Electoral Officer's office. The ECI has directed Kolkata Police to ensure immediate safety measures for officials at their offices, residences, and during travel, citing the sensitivity of upcoming elections.

title: Delhi again found most polluted; study finds persistently high PM2.5 levels across India
content: Delhi emerges as India's most polluted region, with PM2.5 levels a staggering 20 times the WHO guideline. A new satellite study reveals the Indo-Gangetic airshed remains critically polluted, while the Northeast, particularly Assam-Tripura, is a growing concern.  This year-round crisis demands a shift from city-centric to airshed-based pollution management.

title: Google Meet down: Thousands of users not able to join meetings
content: Google Meet is experiencing a widespread outage, preventing thousands of users in India from joining meetings. Reports indicate a surge in issues around midday, with many users encountering "502 error" messages and login problems. The company's status dashboard confirms service disruptions, but no resolution timeline has been provided.

title: Tata Sierra 2025 launched at Rs 11.49 lakh with bold SUV design & luxury interiors
content: The TATA Sierra has returned with a striking makeover, blending luxury, technology, and performance for the premium SUV market. Priced from Rs 11.49 Lakh, it aims to offer an aspirational yet attainable driving experience.  With its "Escape Mediocre" ethos, the Sierra transforms every journey into an extraordinary adventure through comfort, advanced features, and robust performance.

title: Russian oil trade: Discounts soften impact of losing sanctioned barrels
content: US sanctions on Rosneft and Lukoil are impacting Indian refiners less than anticipated, as wider discounts on Russian crude offset expected volume drops. Refiners are sourcing from non-sanctioned suppliers, with increased discounts nearly compensating for reduced Russian cargo intake. This shift, coupled with a well-supplied global market, keeps procurement costs stable.

title: Bihar DElEd result 2025 released: Check direct link to download scorecards here
content: Bihar School Examination Board has released the DElEd Joint Entrance Examination 2025 results. Over 2.5 lakh candidates have passed the exam. The pass percentage stands at 79.01%. Admissions to DElEd institutions will commence soon through an online counselling system. The application window opens on November 29 and closes on December 5, 2025.

title: Gentildonna passes away at 16: Tributes pour in for Japan Cup 2012 champion
content: Japanese racing legend Gentildonna, the real horse behind the popular Umamusume character, has passed away at 16. Celebrated for her seven G1 victories, including two Japan Cups and the Triple Tiara, she captivated fans and inspired a generation. Her peaceful passing at Northern Farm marks the end of an illustrious career, leaving a lasting legacy in both racing and gaming.

title: Meerut blue drum murder: Accused Muskan names newborn 'Radha'; in-laws demand DNA test
content: Accused of murdering her husband and concealing his body, Muskan named her newborn daughter Radha. Her in-laws are demanding a DNA test to confirm the baby's parentage, stating they will only accept the child if proven to be Saurabh Rajput's biological daughter. The baby was born on what would have been Saurabh's birthday.

title: Home whitewash: 'Test cricket can't survive on chaos' - Kumble slams Team India
content: India's recent Test series defeat to South Africa has sparked widespread criticism from former cricketers like Anil Kumble and Venkatesh Prasad. They are calling for an urgent overhaul of the team's strategy, citing issues like excessive all-rounder selection and constant team changes. This marks a significant decline in India's home Test performance.

title: New low! India fall below Pakistan in WTC table after 0-2 whitewash against South Africa
content: South Africa completed a historic tour, recording only their second Test series victory in India â€” and their first since the iconic 2000 triumph under Hansie Cronje. The result also marked Indiaâ€™s biggest defeat by runs in Test cricket, adding further weight to an already bruising outcome. The impact was immediate in the WTC table.

title: 'Will be pleasantly surprised by the actions of Xi': Trump confirms China visit in April
content: President Donald Trump announced plans to visit Beijing in April, citing a strong personal rapport with Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping. The leaders discussed trade, Ukraine, and fentanyl during a recent phone call, aiming to maintain positive momentum. Trump also highlighted strong US-Japan ties during recent diplomatic outreach.

title: Watch: Israeli teenager hangs on crane for 8 hours; claims he climbed to 'see the view'
content: In a gripping event in Jerusalem, emergency crews executed a remarkable rescue of a 15-year-old boy who found himself perilously suspended 300 meters high on a crane. Climbing up for an adventurous view, the teenager hung there for several hours before firefighters launched a sophisticated operation to bring him back to safety.

title: Pune airport chaos: Pilot refuses to fly plane to Delhi; cites duty-time cap
content: Over 100 Delhi-bound flyers faced a three-hour delay at Pune airport Tuesday morning after an IndiGo captain refused to fly due to flight duty time limitations. An Amritsar-bound IndiGo flight also experienced a similar delay for the same reason. Passengers expressed frustration over the lack of prior information and airline planning.

title: 'Need real oxygen of friends and family': Sweden NRI says loneliness abroad worse than AQI back home
content: An Indian man, Ankur Tyagi, is returning to Delhi from Sweden, finding life there emotionally easier despite Europe's clean air and systems. He misses the strong community and human contact, stating that while India has chaos, it also offers support. Tyagi acknowledges Delhi's pollution but prioritizes the 'oxygen' of friends and family, a sentiment echoed by others considering similar moves.

title: $9.12 million Superman comic: Three brothers discover first edition in family attic
content: A rare first-edition 1939 Superman comic book, discovered in a family attic, has shattered records by selling for over $9 million. This unrestored, high-grade copy, found by three brothers while clearing out their late mother's belongings, is now the most expensive comic ever sold, highlighting its cultural significance and pristine condition.

title: Near record highs again: Why Nifty-Sensex created Rs 4 lakh crore wealth in a day
content: Indian stock markets are nearing record highs. A significant surge in investor wealth occurred on Wednesday. This rally is fueled by hopes of interest rate cuts in India and abroad. Global market optimism and declining crude oil prices are also contributing factors. Foreign investors are returning as buyers. Corporate earnings are showing signs of recovery, leading to broad market participation.

title: 'Not clicked at comedy club': Kunal Kamra wears T-shirt mocking RSS; BJP warns of police action
content: Comedian Kunal Kamra has sparked controversy with a social media post featuring a T-shirt seemingly mocking the RSS. The BJP has reacted strongly, with leaders warning of police action against such objectionable content. This incident follows Kamra's previous clashes with political figures, including Prime Minister Modi and Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde.

title: Delhi blast: NIA takes Muzammil to Al-Falah campus rooms where ammonium nitrate was kept
content: NIA recreated the Delhi blast crime scene with arrested Al-Falah University doctor Muzammil Ahmad Ganaie. He was taken to rented rooms where explosives were stored and to his university accommodation, believed to be the plot's nerve center. Investigators are probing the doctors' alleged links to handlers in Pakistan and Turkey.

title: South Africa create history: First Test series win in India in 25 years
content: South Africa registered a massive 408-run victory over India in the second Test, securing a 2-0 series sweep. Spinner Simon Harmer's exceptional 6-wicket haul dismantled India's batting for 140, marking India's heaviest Test defeat by runs and South Africa's first series win in India in 25 years. Marco Jansen was named player of the match for his all-round performance.

title: â€˜City I lived in for 13 years doesnâ€™t want meâ€™: Kashmiri Muslim tenants face bias in Delhi
content: Kashmiri Muslims in Delhi face severe housing discrimination following a recent terror attack. Professionals like Maria Bilal and Omar Peerzada report being denied rentals solely based on their religion, despite strong credentials. This trend, acknowledged by brokers and even the J&K Chief Minister, highlights a growing alienation for the community.

title: Indiaâ€™s private universities under SC scanner: Centre, states & UGC asked to reveal how they are run
content: The Supreme Court has turned a studentâ€™s name-change dispute into a nationwide audit of private, non-government and deemed universities. It has directed the Centre, states, UTs and UGC to file personally signed affidavits revealing how these universities were set up, who controls them, what benefits they received and whether their â€˜no-profitâ€™ claims match how money is actually used.

title: Historic collapse! India suffer biggest Test defeat as SA seal first series win in 25 yrs
content: WTC champions South Africa secured a historic 408-run victory over India in Guwahati, marking their first Test series win on Indian soil in 25 years. Simon Harmer's six-wicket haul in the second innings propelled South Africa to a commanding 2-0 series sweep, handing India their largest-ever Test defeat by runs.

title: New Zealand officials had to destroy Kash Patel's controversial gifts
content: New Zealand officials faced a dilemma after receiving revolvers from FBI chief Kash Patel, as possessing them is illegal. These "Maverick PG22" firearms, inspired by toy guns, were deemed operable despite their toy-like appearance.  The five officials voluntarily surrendered the weapons, which are treated as conventional firearms under New Zealand law, prompting their destruction.

title: Uri hydro plant: How CISF thwarted Pak retaliation, evacuated families during Op Sindoor
content: CISF personnel displayed extraordinary courage, foiling a Pakistani retaliation that put the Uri hydroelectric plant under risk and nearby residents amidst intense shelling. Their swift actions led to the safe evacuation of 250 civilians and secured critical national assets. Nineteen CISF members were honored for their bravery during this high-risk operation following India's retaliatory 'Operation Sindoor'.

title: 'Secularism is endangered': Mamata Banerjee on Constitution Day
content: On Constitution Day, West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee urged citizens to protect democratic values, secularism, and federalism, calling the Constitution India's backbone. Opposition leaders, including Arvind Kejriwal and M.K. Stalin, echoed calls to defend constitutional ideals and resist forces undermining them, emphasizing the need to uphold justice, liberty, equality, and fraternity for all.

title: Canucks goalie Kevin Lankinen steps away; how his absence could impact season
content: Vancouver Canucks face a goaltending crisis on a crucial road trip as Kevin Lankinen departs for personal reasons. This leaves the team without their recent starter, compounding the absence of the injured Thatcher Demko.  AHL call-ups Jiri Patera and Nikita Tolopilo are now on standby, highlighting the team's urgent need for stability between the pipes.

title: Ayesha Curry shares heartfelt note to Stephen days after marriage remark
content: Ayesha Curry posted a heartwarming message for her husband Stephen Curry's new book, "Shot Ready," amidst recent online backlash. She had previously expressed on a podcast that she didn't initially want marriage or children, leading to fan outrage and accusations of disrespecting her husband.

title: Jammie Booker wins Worldâ€™s Strongest Woman title as Andrea Thompson issues protest
content: The 2025 World's Strongest Woman event sparked controversy as Jammie Booker, reportedly a biological male, secured the top prize. Runner-up Andrea Thompson's visible dismay and subsequent comments ignited a fierce debate on fairness in women's sports. Prominent athletes and fans rallied behind Thompson, questioning the integrity of the competition and advocating for clear rules.

title: Team India suffers third home Test series whitewash â€“ A look at the list
content: South Africa achieved a historic 2-0 Test series sweep in India, securing their biggest ever victory by 408 runs in Guwahati. This marks their first series win on Indian soil in 25 years. Simon Harmer's exceptional spin bowling and Aiden Markram's record-breaking catches were instrumental in India's heaviest Test defeat.

title: Gold price today: Yellow metal rises; check 24K, 22K city-wise rates
content: Gold and silver prices surged on Wednesday, driven by weak US economic data that bolstered expectations of a Federal Reserve interest rate cut next month. This global trend influenced domestic futures markets, with gold and silver contracts seeing significant gains. Analysts attribute the rise to anticipated monetary easing by the Fed.

title: 'A little disappointing': Rishabh Pant admits SA dominated; India slump to huge defeat
content: India suffered their largest-ever Test defeat, losing by 408 runs to South Africa in Guwahati, resulting in a 2-0 series whitewash for the visitors. Chasing 549, India collapsed for 140, with Simon Harmer taking 6/37. Stand-in skipper Rishabh Pant acknowledged the team's need to learn quickly from tactical and batting failures.

title: Students torch VIT campus, vehicles in Madhya Pradesh over â€˜poorâ€™ wate, food quality
content: Nearly 3,000 to 4,000 students protested on the Vellore Institute of Technologyâ€™s (VIT) Sehore campus over the quality of food and water, a police official said

title: Tenders worth â‚¹6.46 crore for station redevelopment projects in Kollam and Alappuzha
content: Sasthamkotta and Karunagappally in Kollam, and Haripad and Punnapra in Alappuzha are the stations in focus

title: After eight years of struggle, Varamballi residents in Karnataka get BSNL network connectivity
content: While the residents first wrote a letter to the PM in 2017, work for the construction of the tower began only in May 2025.

title: Franceâ€™s Safran breaks ground for M88 military engine maintenance facility worth â‚¬40 million in Hyderabad
content: The French firmâ€™s India revenue set to triple to over â‚¬3 billion by 2030 on the back of various projects, says CEO Olivier Andries

title: CM Mamata hails West Bengal's second rank in foreign tourist arrivals after Maharashtra
content: Uttar Pradesh (646.81 million) and Tamil Nadu (306.84 million) topped the list of States in terms of domestic tourist footfall

title: Centre releases updated scholarship guidelines for Scheduled Caste students
content: Students will also receive an academic allowance of â‚¹86,000 in the first year and â‚¹41,000 in subsequent years to cover living expenses, books and laptops

title: World Bank approves funding for two projects in Punjab and Maharashtra
content: The World Bank has approved the use of innovative digital solutions to improve the quality of education in Punjab and boost incomes for small and marginal farmers in Maharashtra

title: 41 Maoists surrender in Chhattisgarh's Bijapur; 32 of them carried â‚¹1.19 crore bounty
content: â€œCadres, including 12 women, turned themselves in before senior police officials, citing they were impressed by government's new surrender and rehabilitation policy,â€ Bijapur Superintendent of Police

title: Telangana CM urges PM to declare Bengaluru-Hyderabad defence, aerospace corridor to propel Viksit Bharat goals
content: Revanth Reddy invites Narendra Modi to Telangana Rising 2047 Global Summit, says State is developing Bharat Future City on 30,000 acres as Net Zero city that will be Indiaâ€™s answer to New York, Tokyo, Dubai, Singapore and South Korea

title: T.N. CM Stalin inaugurates memorial for freedom fighter Maaveeran Pollan in Erode district
content: Mr. Stalin, while addressing at a government function in Erode district, said internal reservation uplifted Arunthathiyar community

title: Kerala HC directs Revenue dept to temporarily accept land tax from families living in disputed Munambam land
content: Court direction comes on a plea by Munambam Bhoo Samrakshana Samithi and others which submitted that the village officer concerned was not accepting tax, citing Waqf Board claims over property

title: CJI says will â€˜considerâ€™ plea to revive NJAC, end Collegium system
content: The  NJAC, which briefly gave the government an equal role along with the judiciary in the appointment of judges to the constitutional courts, was struck down by the Supreme Court in 2015 as unconstitutional

content: Read exclusive, in-depth articles from The Hindu on the facets of the working of the Constitution in the last 75 years, and more

title: Visva-Bharati to host UGC meet of nearly 400 colleges on making courses industry-friendly
content: Close to 400 universities and autonomous colleges from 11 States of the east and northeast have been invited for the big conference, called VIKAS 2025

content: Explore the colonial legacy of Indiaâ€™s Constitution and its impact on citizenship, equality, and personal liberties through diverse philosophical insights

title: India's MRO sector to be worth $4bn by 2031: Civil Aviation Minister Ram Mohan Naidu
content: India will become a preferred destination for aircraft maintenance activities, says Civil Aviation Minister Ram Mohan Naidu

content: Explore the evolving significance of Indiaâ€™s Constitution, its foundational principles, and the threats posed by current political dynamics

title: Ilaiyaraaja urges Madras High Court to prevent use of his songs in movie â€˜Dudeâ€™
content: Justice N. Senthilkumar reserves orders on the interim injunction plea made in a civil suit filed by the composer against Hyderabad-based Mythri Movie Makers

title: Eminent Yakshagana script writer Raghurama Shetty passes away
content: A teacher by profession, Raghurama Shetty gave a new dimension to Yakshagana by writing â€˜prasangasâ€™ with social relevance.

title: Names proposed by Kerala-based researchers approved for Martian landforms
content: 3.5 billion-year-old crater now named after pioneering geologist M.S. Krishnan. Several place names in Kerala also get Martian counterparts

title: Kerala SIR not a problem, already distributed 90% enumeration forms: EC in Supreme Court
content: The SIR process is scheduled from November 4 to December 4, ahead of Keralaâ€™s local body elections from December 9 to 11

title: Tributes paid to martyrs on 26/11 Mumbai terror attack anniversary
content: Several people also paid homage at CSMT, Cama and Albless Hospital and other locations which were targeted by the Pakistani terrorists

content: Explore B.R. Ambedkarâ€™s pivotal yet unfinished agenda on social justice, gender equality, and the Uniform Civil Code in India

title: Freak accidents on basketball court kill two teenage boys in Rohtak, Bahadurgarh
content: Following the incidents, Rohtak Deputy Commissioner on Wednesday constituted four-member committees, each headed by respective Sub-Divisional Officer, to conduct physical inspection of all sports facilities

content: Exploring the intricate relationship between religious identity and legal frameworks, this analysis reveals how colonial legacies continue to shape contemporary interpretations of citizenship, minority rights, and social justice within Indiaâ€™s constitutional landscape

content: Mamata Banerjee said the citizenship of people is being questioned after so many years of Independence

content: Justice Mehta had found that the High Court and trial court had â€œglossed overâ€ the gapsÂ inÂ the prosecution case, to find the accused guilty and give him the death penalty

title: Sengottaiyan resigns as Gobichettipalayam MLA
content: Mr. Sengottaiyan refusedÂ to speak to the press when asked about speculation of him soon joining actor Vijayâ€™s Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam (TVK)

title: PM Modi inaugurates French major Safranâ€™s MRO facility in Hyderabad; urges it to design aircraft engine, components in India
content: Emphasises on â€˜Design in Indiaâ€™ at the inauguration of the largest MRO facility globally for LEAP engines the firm has set up in Hyderabad

title: SIT questioned Sabarimala tantris in gold theft case ahead of Mandala-Makaravilakku season
content: The key development, which has surfaced in public domain rather belatedly, signalled that the investigation had touched upon Sabarimala templeâ€™s priestly orthodoxy.Â Tantri Kandararu Rajeevaru tells reporters in Pathanamthitta that he had â€˜honestly answeredâ€™ SITâ€™s questions

title: IRCTC hotel scam: Court issues notice to CBI on Rabri Devi's plea seeking transfer of graft case to another judge
content: Principal and Sessions Judge Dinesh Bhatt was hearing the plea of the Rashtriya Janata Dal leader and issued the notice to the CBI

content: Explore the paradox of Indiaâ€™s post-colonial transition: a constitution designed for revolution without embracing the chaos of one

content: SIT produces Padmakumar before Inquiry Commissioner and Special Vigilance Judge in Kollam. Court remands him in SIT custody till Friday

title: Bar indispensable in upholding sanctity of Constitution: CJI Surya Kant
content: The CJI said he often speaks about the invisible victims of the judicial system and it is his sincere belief that only the Bar can rescue them from such agony.

title: Maharashtra local polls: Vote for Shiv Sena is vote for development, says Shinde
content: â€œWe want to end VIP culture, work to bring good days for the downtrodden. For development, vote for change, and elect the Shiv Sena candidate in the upcoming local body election," says Eknath Shinde

title: Constitution guiding document to shun colonial mindset, adopt nationalistic thinking: President Murmu
content: Addressing the Constitution Day event at the Central Hall of the Old Parliament building, now called 'Samvidhan Sadan', President Murmu said India is presenting a new model of development for the world

title: Minister's remark on IIT-Bombay's name shows governmentâ€™s mindset: Raj Thackeray
content: Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) president Raj Thackeray said that Minister Jitendra Singhâ€™s statement clearly appears to be a symbol of the government's mindset

title: How Kerala can learn from Assamâ€™s model to manage rhinos entering human habitats
content: Kerala and Assam face rising man-animal conflict in villages close to wildlife sanctuaries or forest fringe areas

title: Ootupurai, the traditional feeding house in Kanniyakumari temples
content: Ootupurai, where Brahmins were served free meals, was once a familiar institution across southern Travancore and Kanniyakumari district which remained part of Kerala until 1957. Although the British administration ordered the discontinuation ofÂ thisÂ system in 1922, it survived in several temples long after the decree.

title: Kolkata Chartered Accountant Murdered In Hotel Room By Dating App Partner
content: The police investigation into the murder of a chartered accountant in a Kolkata hotel has revealed that the young man was allegedly killed after he refused to pay Rs 20,000 demanded by his partner from a dating app.

title: "Out Of Control": Trump Targets Rivals After Woman Set On Fire On Chicago Subway
content: A 26-year-old woman was set on fire aboard a moving CTA Blue Line train in downtown Chicago by a man with 72 prior arrests. The attack occurred around 9 pm on November 17, police said.

title: Mitchell, Cunningham move up in latest NBA 2K26 ratings
content: 2K Games has announced its next round of changes to ratings for NBA 2K26 to reflect players' real-life ability on the court . Cade Cunningham from the Detroit Pistons is another player moving up by one point, to a 93 OVR . he scored 46 points with 12 rebounds, 11 assists, five steals and two blocks .

title: Transfer portal primer: 'At 12:01 a.m. on Jan. 2, you're going to see people instantly commit'
content: the transfer portal officially opens on Jan. 2, the day after the college football playoff quarterfinals . the spring portal window in April means programs have one shot to get this right if they want to win big in 2026 . this season has brought more proof of concept that a portal-heavy approach can dramatically flip a program's fortunes, with Indiana and Texas Tech in the national championship hunt .

title: The wolves of Real Madrid are already snarling at Xabi Alonso's door
content: Xabi Alonso has defended his side following their 2-2 draw against Elche . the real madrid boss is in the top eight positions of the UEFA champions league . but he'll know he is. wolves are at the door and someone at his club is encouraging them to snarl .

title: MLB offseason grades: Boston bolsters rotation with swap for Sonny Gray
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here . we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . a big-money free agent signing changes the course of your team's future or a blockbuster trade .

title: CFP Bubble Watch after Tuesday's ranking: Who needs a win during Rivalry Week?
content: the ACC's hope of having two teams qualify for the 12-team field is still alive . five ACC teams are still ranked above no. 24 Tulane, the only representative from a group of 5 conference . a gap remains in spite of the head-to-head win .

title: Sources: CSU expected to hire UConn's Mora
content: the deal is expected to come together in the near future, sources say . he will come to Colorado State as the school is joining the Pac-12 . it has churned through Mike Bobo, Steve Addazio and Jay Norvell .

title: Week 14 Anger Index: Why BYU, Notre Dame and others should be mad
content: Ohio State stays atop the latest CFP rankings, with Indiana, Texas A&M, Georgia and Texas Tech all remaining in their same spots in the top five . a botched extra point at the end of Notre Dame-Texas a&M still hinges on the college football playoff rankings . the canes had a 90% chance of winning, according to ESPN's metrics .

title: Bills add help at receiver, sign veteran Cooks
content: the bills have elevated receiver Gabe Davis from the practice squad for the past two games . second-year receiver Keon Coleman has been a healthy scratch for the last two games stemming initially from disciplinary issues . quarterback dalton Kincaid has the most receiving touchdowns on the team wi-fi .

title: Jokic, SGA, Giannis and Luka are off to historic starts: Why this MVP race could be epic
content: Nikola Jokic has the best statistical start of his much-celebrated career in 2025-26 . he's averaging 29.6 points, 12.8 rebounds and 11.1 assists through 17 games this season . two other players in NB are eclipsing that mark .

title: Who's making the grade, and who's failing at the NHL quarter mark? Grades for all 32 teams
content: the 2025-26 season has reached its quarter mark, with all 32 teams having played more than 20 games . a first-quarter letter grade for all 32 clubs is through the games of Nov. 23 . they lead the NHL in goals per game while also giving up the fewest goals .
